jobDescription: On-site residential property management office is looking to hire a project manager experienced in maintenance and repair of building operations systems. The candidate will oversee several capital renovation projects, including inspecting contractors’ work prior to sign-off, and report to the building General Manager. We are looking for a candidate who has worked in facilities/property management for not less than 6 years and who has been involved in capital renovation projects.Must be computer literate. Knowledge of Outlook and Word is a must, as well.We offer full benefits package and salary based on experience. Send your resume and cover letter.
